Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch

Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold-plated. Two- tone brass finish. 1.85 in. Dia. Featuring a two-tone crest design on its case back, classic profile, and skeleton dial with black-tone Roman numeral hour markers, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch 3711 is both elegant and understated. Seventeen-jewel mechanical movement ensures reliable time-keeping, while black-tone Roman numeral hour markers and three black-tone hands stand out against a creamy white background.
